mapper.select: SELECT ten_san_pham, SUM(so_luong) AS tong_so_luong, MONTH (ngay_nhap) AS thang, YEAR (ngay_nhap) AS nam FROM inbound JOIN chi_tiet_nhap_hang ON inbound.ma_inbound = chi_tiet_nhap_hang.ma_inbound JOIN san_pham ON san_pham.sys_id_san_pham = chi_tiet_nhap_hang.sys_id_san_pham WHERE chi_tiet_nhap_hang.sys_id_san_pham GROUP BY YEAR (ngay_nhap), MONTH (ngay_nhap) ORDER BY nam, thang;
